page.title: 07HOUSING CONTINUED
page.content: detached, dormer bungalows and true bungalows. Many of the oldest houses in the area are{weavers cottages}like the ones near Dale Mill on Dale Street. These properties are three storeys high and originally the top floor was used for weaving. These old houses are built from sandstone taken from quarries in the local area. Their roofs are also made of stone. The houses built in the last 30 years generally have garages, gardens and more rooms than the older properties. Earlier this year gas was laid on to the Pennine Drive estate.
